keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: NATIONAL AIR AND SPACE MUSEUM (WASHINGTON, DC)

results.snippet: WASHINGTON, D.C.  It's a bird, it's a plane, it's Supermuseum! It's the Air and Space Museum of the Smithsonian Institution, dedicated this week for the Bicentennial, and it stretches 685 glass and marble feet, or more than three city blocks, along...
results.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, D.C. It's a bird, it's a plane, it's Supermuseum! It's the Air and Space Museum of the Smithsonian Institution, dedicated this week for the Bicentennial, and it stretches 685 glass and marble feet, or more than three city blocks, along the Mall. Air and Space is the latest of that crushing group of megaliths that house the Smithsonian's remarkable collections of American art, history, science and culture.

headline.main: Choice of Convention Speaker Often Way For Repaying Debt or Rewarding Friend
